ivardefs.name: contraindicatedVaccineCode_
ivardefs.desc: Vaccine(s) which should not be used to fulfill the recommendation.

ivardefs.name: dateCriterion_
ivardefs.desc: Vaccine date recommendations.  For example, earliest date to administer, latest date to administer, etc.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: Contains the description about the protocol under which the vaccine was administered.

ivardefs.name: forecastReason_
ivardefs.desc: The reason for the assigned forecast status.

ivardefs.name: forecastStatus
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the patient status with respect to the path to immunity for the target disease.

ivardefs.name: series
ivardefs.desc: One possible path to achieve presumed immunity against a disease - within the context of an authority.

ivardefs.name: supportingImmunization_
ivardefs.desc: Immunization event history and/or evaluation that supports the status and recommendation.

ivardefs.name: supportingPatientInformation_
ivardefs.desc: Patient Information that supports the status and recommendation.  This includes patient observations, adverse reactions and allergy/intolerance information.

ivardefs.name: targetDisease_
ivardefs.desc: The targeted disease for the recommendation.

ivardefs.name: vaccineCode_
ivardefs.desc: Vaccine(s) or vaccine group that pertain to the recommendation.
